column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Their menu is full of great Southern favorites. Pimento cheese
column3: and all tweaked to modern day perfection. I opted for the Bosscat burger which was great. I am a foodie that cooks almost everyday and I recognized that they don't over-handle the hamburger after it has been ground. I prefer this. It makes for much juicier home-style burger. So pieces of the burger did fall off
column4: but That's just part of the juiciest burger experience. (At an 11th St. Heights restaurant
column5: the burgers were pressed into hockey pucks. Very hard to swallow or enjoy. That place is now closed. I wonder why.)
